Text:
Try

    SELECT title, COUNT(title)
    from person_works_in  p
    inner join movie_table m on p.movie_id = m.person_id
    WHERE m.role in ('producer', 'writer')
    group by title
    having count(disctinct m.role) = 2

You did not define a relation between the tables. Your query must be adjusted here

Try

    SELECT title, COUNT(title)
    from movie_table
    WHERE role in ('producer', 'writer')
    group by title
    having count(disctinct role) = 2

You did not define a relation between the tables. Your query must be adjusted here

Try

    SELECT title, COUNT(title)
    from movie_table
    WHERE role in ('producer', 'writer')
    group by title
    having count(distinct role) = 2

Try

    SELECT title, COUNT(title)
    from movie_table
    WHERE role in ('producer', 'writer')
    group by title
    having count(distinct role) = 2
    and count(distinct movie_person) = 1

Try

    SELECT COUNT(title) 
    from movie_table
    WHERE role in ('producer', 'writer')
    and movie_person is not null
    group by title
    having count(distinct role) = 2
    and count(distinct movie_person) = 1

Try

    SELECT sum(1)
    from movie_table
    WHERE role in ('producer', 'writer')
    and movie_person is not null
    group by title
    having count(distinct role) = 2
    and count(distinct movie_person) = 1

Try

    SELECT COUNT(title) 
    from movie_table
    WHERE role in ('producer', 'writer')
    and movie_person is not null
    group by title
    having count(distinct role) = 2
    and count(distinct movie_person) = 1
